title: Chapter V - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of City Jails-town And Village Lockups
content:
Chapter V - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of City Jails-town And Village Lockups

State Regulations

Part 7500 - Legal Authority (§ 7500.1)

Part 7501 - Definitions (§ 7501.1)

Part 7502 - Admission Procedures (§ 7502.1)

Part 7503 - Medical (§ 7503.1)

Part 7504 - Supervision Of Detention Areas (§ 7504.1)

Part 7505 - Food (§ 7505.1)

Part 7506 - Sanitation And Maintenance (§ 7506.1)

Part 7507 - Discipline (§ 7507.1)

Part 7508 - Reportable Incidents (§ 7508.1 to 7508.2)

Part 7509 - Records (§ 7509.1)

Part 7510 - Visits (§ 7510.1)

Part 7511 - Construction And Renovation (§ 7511.1)

Part 7512 - Variances (§ 7512.1 to 7512.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
